title: Two 19-year-olds sought in shooting that left 2 dead, 2 wounded at Covina house party
dc:creator: Summer Lin
description: Authorities are searching for Joel Daniel Garcia and Brian Thomas Ramos in connection with a deadly shooting at a Covina house party.
content:encoded: Authorities are searching for Joel Daniel Garcia and Brian Thomas Ramos in connection with a deadly shooting at a Covina house party.

media:content.media:description: Suspects wanted in connection with a shooting that left two people dead and two others wounded at a Covina house party early Sunday are Brian Thomas Ramos, left, and Joel Daniel Garcia. Both are 19.
